title: All about Christmas
description: Kirkus' Review An animated account bustles with the spirit of the season and documents the traditions from their derivation to their application now. From St. Nick and the Wise Men to the holly and mistletoe and the special songs and carols-all are traced and their significance heightened by the associations they bring. Fine for reference, schools and libraries. Pub Oct. 20th, 1954 Harper
author: Dorothy Nicolle
